response.answer: To print/reprint documents, click the Documents link in the left navigation pane. On the Online Documents tab, click the View button for the appropriate document, then print the document as normal. From the Print Customer Documents tab, click the View/Print button for the appropriate document, then print as normal. From the Resend Print tab,  select the check box to the left of the appropriate document(s) and click the Resend button. Note: using this feature mails a copy of the document directly to the customer.

response.answer: I am not able to provide information on specific error messages, but in general, there are two types of common errors:  1. Action Required errors prompt for certain fields to be completed to advance to the next screen. 2. System Validation/Informational messages may require action before binding a policy but typically do not prevent quoting.  Here is a link to more information about validation messages:
descarray: Job Aid - Types of Validation Messages in PolicyCenter

response.answer: **Property third party** or **mortgagee** are equivalent to **third party** in PolicyCenter.
**Property third party** or **mortgagee** are equivalent to **third party** in PolicyCenter.

To find underwriting comments, navigate to My Activities in your Desktop tab, and click the link of the activity you wish to review comments on. Click the View Notes button to view the notes from the underwriter.  Here is a link to more information about finding underwriting comments:
descarray: Job Aid - Follow-up Capabilities for Agents

response.answer: **Conversion to PolicyCenter** is equivalent to **policy transfer** in PolicyCenter.

To unlock a policy:  1. Click the Underwriting link to review the approval reason. 2. Click Request Approval for the blocking bind, and fill out Description, Topic, Subject, and any useful text. 3. You'll see a decision later under My Activities on your Desktop tab.   Here are some links to more information about unlocking a policy:
descarray: Job Aid - Clear Underwriting PreQuote Issue
Job Aid - Request Underwriter Approval

There is a limitation of 4 vehicles per auto policy. A fifth vehicle policy is written when a customer wants to insure an additional vehicle and already has a 4-vehicle policy in force.  1. On the summary screen of the source policy, click the Actions button and select 5th vehicle.  2. Complete the 5th vehicle quote using the Create 5th Vehicle Policy job aid as your guide.
descarray: Job Aid - How to Quote a New Customer with 5 or More Vehicles - Auto
Job Aid - Create 5th Vehicle Policy - Auto

To find a list of policy renewals:  1. Click the Team tab in PolicyCenter and then click the Renewals link.  2. The display defaults to renewals in Open status. You can view bound or renewed policies by clicking the arrow to the right of Status field.
descarray: Job Aid - Policy Renewal Process (Team Tab)

response.answer: Did you select Easy Pay Discount on the Policy Info screen? If so, the only installment option available will be Recurring EFT - Recurring Electronic Funds Transfer.  You must still select the radio button to the left of the Recurring EFT option. Once that is selected, the Installment Details section will display on the right side of the screen. Click the Enter Installment Details button and complete all fields.
Quotes are automatically saved in PolicyCenter - you don't need to do anything to save your quote.
The Privacy Statement is added on the Online Documents tab of the Documents screen. Click the Add button and select **Privacy Statement** from the list.
Are you quoting a home or auto policy?
**30 day diary** is a follow-up reminder for a new activity.
Only current and retired Nationwide employees are eligible to receive the associate discount. Please enter the 6-digit employee ID in the field marked **Associate ID.**

response.answer: Insurability Guidelines are found in Reference Connect. There is a link to Reference Connect on Agent Gateway or Agent Center, whichever platform you use.
On the Policy Info screen, under the Discounts section. Selection of the Property Product adds Home/Car discount, where applicable.
If you are looking for and Agent of Record form (AoR form), this can be retrieved from the policy transfer team. The phone number is 800-940-7757, option 2, 2, 2.
Please click the Retrieve MSB button to bring information from MSB over to the quote in PolicyCenter.
Addresses should be updated at the policy level rather than the account level.

On the Policy Info screen, in the Discounts section, select Yes to the Paperless Policy question. Select Online Account Access and enter a valid email address in the Nationwide Documents/Email section. Confirm these selections on the Payments screen. Paperless Discount applies to Auto policies only.
There are many reasons why an address may need to be validated, so please click below if you would like to speak with a trainer directly to resolve.

To start any quote, first pull up the client in order to access the Account Summary screen. Click the arrow to the right of the Actions field, and then select "New Submission" from the drop-down menu.  What type of quote would you like to start?

response.answer: The Billing Calculator is a centralized service that receives billing and payment information. The calculator allows you to determine installment payments based on changes on the policy. It is only available for unbound/pending work orders – changes and renewals.
descarray: Job Aid - Billing Calculator

response.answer: The prior losses tab in the underwriting page on PolicyCenter will show you any closed claims that are impacting premium on the policy. If you wish to view open claims or claims that are not being merit-rated, you can view those on your legacy systems via client or claim inquiry.
The beginning-of-day process has not changed and remains the same.

Changes to billing options can be completed on the Mortgagee/Billing screen, in the Policy/Billing Options section. Don't forget to update any applicable information on the Payments screen, as well. For example, if the policy is Third Party Billed, you will need to set up Recurring EFT payment information. If the policy is bound, you must start a policy change to complete this action.
Credit will only be ordered for the Primany Named Insured (PNI) and spouse on Auto policies.
The spinoff policy should be completed in the legacy system.
Is the source policy in PolicyCenter?

response.answer: If this is a new quote, go to the Dwelling Construction screen, and click the Launch MSB button. Enter and save information in MSB, then return to PolicyCenter. Click the Retrieve from MSB button. If you have already pulled from MSB and need to update, copy the MSB Estimate # from the Coverages screen, and return to the Dwelling Construction screen. Paste the estimate # in the Find existing using estimate number field. Click the Launch MSB button, update the information, save, and click the Retrieve from MSB button.

On the Underwriting screen, click the Prior Policies tab. Confirm the information returned from the Current Carrier report, update if necessary. You may be to click the Edit button at the top of the work pane to make any updates.

Documents associated with a Homeowners policy are found on the Documents screen. For example, Declarations and Valuables Plus Schedule documentation can be viewed and printed from the Online Documents tab.
Please refer to page 5 of the job aid below.
descarray: Job Aid – Create Billing Account for a New Submission

response.answer: Ensure all Mortgagee information is added in the Third Party Lienholder section of the Mortgagee/Billing screen. Next, select Third Party Billed in the Policy/Billing Options section of the Mortgagee/Billing screen. Then, you will need to set up Recurring EFT payment information on the Payments screen prior to issuing the policy.

response.answer: A policy change can be withdrawn if it is in "quoted" status. A bound change cannot be withdrawn.

descarray: Job Aid - Add Driver Assignment - Auto

response.answer: From the Desktop screen, click the appropriate activity link. Click the View Notes button on the Activity Detail pane.

Accidents and/or Violations can only be overriden on Auto quotes or policy changes to add a new driver. Once a policy has been bound (issued), no one can override the accident or violation.  rr Refer to the Accident Violation Override job aid for steps to override an accident or violation.
descarray: Job Aid - Accident Override Violation - Auto
